name: Paint Wars - PROLOGUE part 1: Devil's Chorus
name_original: Paint Wars - PROLOGUE part 1: Devil's Chorus
description: Hi, i'm Limon (just kidding, that's my username :D) and this is my first game. I used bitsy to created and this PROLOGUE is the first one of a series of games about the history and heroes of Zenbot. Here staring Linon Gatstaedler, the brother of Limon and some of his memories about the past before all the PAINT WAR. Also staring Arthur and Jubalon. I know all is confusing, but new games are coming soon! Thanks for play it! If you like the game or you just doesn't get it, lets talk in the comments! I'm here to help you all with your questions.
